description: Opening call for new leads - warm welcome, pain point discovery, trial signup

nodes.text: Hi [Name], this is [Agent Name] from TitanForge. We received your signup interest today. Do you have a quick minute?

nodes.question: Do they have time to talk?

nodes.text: No problem. When would be a better time? I can call you back then.
Great. I just wanted to personally thank you for checking us out and make sure we're actually a fit for what you're building.

nodes.question: What's the biggest bottleneck in your current dev workflow?

nodes.text: Yeah, that's super common. That's actually why we built TitanForge - to automate exactly that. Our AI agents handle the repetitive stuff so you can focus on the creative work.
Testing is killer for solo devs. That's exactly what our code review and test generation agents handle. Saves most people 5-10 hours per week.
Got it. The beauty of TitanForge is you can set up custom agents for almost any workflow you have.
Most of our beta users are shipping 30-40% faster. You can spin up custom agents for literally any workflow. The cool part? You only pay for what you use.

nodes.question: Ready to try the free trial?

nodes.text: Perfect. I'm sending a link to your email right now. No credit card needed - 14 days, all pro features. Just click the link and you're good to go.
That's fair. But most people get up and running in like 15 minutes. And we have live support - just hit reply on the email.
Totally get it. That's why the trial is perfect - try it risk-free. If it doesn't help, no charge.
What would help you feel more confident trying it?
Awesome. You'll get the email in the next minute. Click the link and you're good to go. If you hit any snags, just reply - we're super responsive. Thanks for chatting with me!
